findings.title: L01. Missing Events on Critical State Updates
findings.description: Users or tools monitoring events might overlook or not expect events declared in libraries, leading to missed logs or additional tracking efforts.

findings.title: L02. Race Condition
findings.description: Race Conditions and Transactions Order Dependency should not be possible.

findings.title: I01. Style Guide Violation
findings.description: Style guide violations were found in the code.

findings.title: Truncating small residual balances
findings.description: Due to integer division when splitting the toVerifiers fee, there is a possibility of truncating small residual balances, leading to minor discrepancies in token distribution.

findings.title: Absence of ReentrancyGuard for ERC721 Functions
findings.description: The project's contracts do not utilize the ReentrancyGuard for functions that interact with ERC721 tokens.

findings.title: Unconventional Event Declaration
findings.description: All events are declared in the MarketLib.sol library, which is unconventional and may lead to missed logs or additional tracking efforts.
